snippet: Gen. Maxwell D. Taylor wrote to President John F. Kennedy that if Cuba were to use nuclear weapons against a United States invasion, the American military would also use such arms.
lead_paragraph: Gen. Maxwell D. Taylor wrote to President John F. Kennedy that if Cuba were to use nuclear weapons against a United States invasion, the American military would also use such arms.

headline.seo: General’s 1962 Memo Addresses Nuclear Combat on Cuba
headline.main: General’s 1962 Memo Addresses Nuclear Combat on Cuba
headline.print_headline: General’s 1962 Memo Addresses Nuclear Combat on Cuba
